title: Number of Sears stores in the United States 2011 - 2017 , by type
summary: The Sears stores of Full-line stores on the road in the European Union was 547 years .
Between 2011 and 2017 , the stores of the continent 's fleet steadily progressed , with the oldest motor United being Specialty stores units .
As of 2017 , the European Union housed 264.2 million registered Full-line stores .
gold: Sears Domestic operated about 547 full-line stores throughout the Unites States in 2017.
Sears Holdings is an American retailer , which operates through two well-known retail brands , Kmart and Sears.
Sears Holdings has a significant number of Kmart and Sears Domestic stores in operation around the world .
